name: The Box (itch) (RoastedProgram)
description:
Welcome to The Box

A simple game where you control a box and get to the end of the level. Use the A and D keys and the left and right arrows to move left and right. Use J/Space/Up Arrows to jump.  As you progress through the levels the game gets harder. Remember to get the box to the end.

This game is still in Early Development so please excuse the graphics and other klunky stuff.
